TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PointHitTestResult extends System.Windows.Media.HitTestResult

summary.span: 表示将 用作命中测试参数的命中测试的结果。

span.span: Represents the results of a hit test that uses a as a hit test parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 还可以通过使用 作为命中测试参数并以形式返回结果，对视觉对象执行命中测试 。You can also perform a hit test on a visual object by using a as a hit test parameter and returning the result as a . 有关详细信息，请参阅 [如何：使用几何图形作为参数进行命中测试](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-hit-test-using-geometry-as-a-parameter)。For more information, see [How to: Hit Test Using Geometry as a Parameter](/dotnet/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-hit-test-using-geometry-as-a-parameter). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 从方法检索返回值 。The following example shows how to retrieve the return value from the method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#100)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#100)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何重写用户定义的可视化对象中的默认命中测试支持。The following example shows how to override default hit test support in a user-defined visual object. 在这种情况下，将创建一个新的， 并从重写的方法返回。In this case, a new is created and returned from the overridden method. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#107](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#107)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#107](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#107)]

summary.span: 获取从命中测试结果返回的视觉对象。

span.span: Gets the visual object that is returned from a hit test result.

value.span: 一个 对象，它表示命中测试结果。

span.span: A object that represents the hit test result.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 单个命中测试过程中，该值可能表示多个视觉对象。The value could potentially represent multiple visual objects during a single hit test. 命中测试回叫方法定义在可视化树中的特定视觉对象上标识命中测试时要执行的操作。The hit test callback method defines the actions you perform when a hit test is identified on a particular visual object in the visual tree. 执行这些操作后，将返回一个 值，该值确定是否继续枚举任何其他视觉对象。After you perform the actions, you return a value that determines whether to continue the enumeration of any other visual objects. 返回的视觉对象的枚举顺序是呈现平面上的 z 顺序。The order of enumeration of returned visual objects is by z-order on the rendering plane. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何访问 命中测试结果回调函数中的属性。The following example shows how to access the property in a hit test results callback function. [!code-csharp[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#102)] [!code-vb[HitTestingOverview#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HitTestingOverview/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#102)]
